product_name: Big Agnes Scout Plus UL2 and Super Scout UL2 Footprint
long_description: Used underneath Big Agnes Scout Plus UL2 or Super Scout UL2 tents, this coated nylon footprint helps protect the floor from abrasion and excess wear during your outdoor adventures. Sizing specific to the tent helps prevent water from pooling between the tent and footprint in rainy weather. Webbing stake-outs at corners allow easy attachment.
short_description: Used underneath Big Agnes Scout Plus UL2 or Super Scout UL2 tents, this coated nylon footprint helps protect the floor from abrasion and excess wear during your outdoor adventures.
